title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black! This coffee maker is perfect for those who want a quick and convenient way to enjoy their favorite coffee.

Key Features:
- Brew Sizes: Choose from 6, 8, or 10 ounces to customize your cup of coffee.
- Brew Time: Get your coffee in under a minute, so you can start your day off right.
- Water Reservoir: Features a 36-ounce water reservoir that is removable for easy filling and cleaning.
- Smart Start: Enjoy a hassle-free brewing experience with the smart start feature.
- Button Controls: The button controls make it simple and easy to use.
- Energy Efficient: Automatically turns off after 2 hours to save energy.
- Drip Tray: The removable drip tray can accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches and holds a full accidental brew.
- Hot Water Dispense: Get hot water for your other beverage needs.
- Dimensions: With a width of 8 inches, this compact coffee maker will fit perfectly in your kitchen.
- Compatibility: Compatible with K-Cup varieties and does not support the use of the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Experience the convenience and deliciousness of the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Get yours today!

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black! This coffee maker is designed to provide you with a convenient and efficient brewing experience.

Key Features:
- Brew Sizes: Enjoy your coffee in three different sizes - 6, 8, and 10 ounces.
- Fast Brew Time: Get your cup of coffee in under a minute, saving you time in the morning rush.
- Water Reservoir: The removable water reservoir has a capacity of 36 ounces, allowing you to brew multiple cups before refilling.
- Smart Start: With the smart start feature, the coffee maker heats up and brews your coffee as soon as you insert a K-Cup pod.
- Button Controls: The easy-to-use button controls make operating the coffee maker a breeze.
- Energy Efficient: The auto-off function turns off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity, saving energy.
- Drip Tray: The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches and can hold a full accidental brew, ensuring a mess-free brewing experience.
- Hot Water Dispense: The coffee maker includes a hot water dispense feature, allowing you to quickly get hot water for other beverages or instant meals.
- Compact Dimensions: With a width of 8 inches, this coffee maker is designed to fit in any kitchen or office space.
- Compatibility: It is compatible with a wide range of K-Cup varieties, giving you a vast selection of coffee flavors. It does not support the use of the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Note: Packaging may vary.

Upgrade your coffee brewing experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black!

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black! This sleek and compact coffee maker is perfect for those who want a quick and convenient cup of coffee at home or in the office.

With the Keurig K-Compact, you can choose from three different brew sizes: 6, 8, or 10 ounces. And the best part? It brews your favorite cup of coffee in under a minute, so you can enjoy your morning pick-me-up in no time.

The water reservoir of the Keurig K-Compact has a capacity of 36 ounces, ensuring that you have enough water to brew multiple cups of coffee without constantly refilling. Plus, the reservoir is removable, making it easy to fill and clean.

This coffee maker also features smart start technology, which means it heats up and brews your coffee as soon as you insert a K-Cup pod. No more waiting for the water to heat up!

Controlling the Keurig K-Compact is a breeze with its button controls. Simply press a button to start brewing your coffee. And when you're done, the coffee maker is energy efficient with an auto-off feature that turns off the machine after 2 hours of inactivity.

The removable drip tray of the Keurig K-Compact is designed to accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall. It also holds a full accidental brew, so you don't have to worry about any messes.

But that's not all! This coffee maker also has a hot water dispense feature, allowing you to quickly and easily get hot water for tea, hot chocolate, and more.

The Keurig K-Compact has dimensions of 8 inches in width, making it compact enough to fit in any kitchen or office space. It is compatible with a wide range of K-Cup pod varieties, so you can enjoy your favorite flavors. Plus, it is compatible with My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately) for those who prefer to use their own ground coffee.

Note: Packaging may vary.

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black! This coffee maker is designed to make your mornings easier and your coffee tastier. Here are the key features:

- Brew Sizes: Choose from 6, 8, or 10 ounces to customize your coffee strength.
- Brew Time: Enjoy a fresh cup of coffee in under a minute.
- Water Reservoir: The removable water reservoir has a capacity of 36 ounces, allowing you to brew multiple cups without refilling frequently.
- Smart Start: With the smart start feature, the coffee maker heats up and brews your coffee as soon as you insert a K-Cup pod.
- Button Controls: Convenient button controls make it easy to operate the coffee maker.
- Energy Efficient: The auto-off feature automatically turns off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity, saving energy.
- Drip Tray: The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches and holds a full accidental brew, making clean-up a breeze.
- Hot Water Dispense: In addition to brewing coffee, the coffee maker can dispense hot water for other beverages or instant meals.
- Compact Dimensions: The coffee maker has a width of 8 inches, making it suitable for small kitchens or limited counter space.
- Compatibility: The coffee maker is compatible with a variety of K-Cup pod varieties. It does not support the use of the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Experience the convenience and deliciousness of the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Start your mornings off right with a perfect cup of coffee every time!

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black! This coffee maker is designed to make your mornings easier and your coffee taste better. 

With a variety of brew sizes to choose from (6, 8, and 10 ounces), you can customize your coffee to your liking. And the best part? It brews in under a minute, so you don't have to wait long for your caffeine fix.

The water reservoir has a generous capacity of 36 ounces and is removable for easy refilling. Plus, it's smart start feature ensures that the water heats up quickly and efficiently. 

Controlling this coffee maker is a breeze with its button controls. And it's not just convenient, it's energy efficient too. The auto-off feature automatically turns off the machine after 2 hours of inactivity, saving electricity and giving you peace of mind.

Cleaning up is a snap with the removable drip tray, which can accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and even holds a full accidental brew. And if you need hot water for other purposes, this coffee maker has a hot water dispensing feature.

Measuring just 8 inches in width, this compact coffee maker won't take up much space on your countertop. It is also compatible with a wide range of K-Cup varieties, allowing you to enjoy a variety of coffee flavors. However, it is not compatible with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Get your Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today and experience the convenience and deliciousness of a freshly brewed cup of coffee in the comfort of your own home.
